#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		long long int n,f1=0,f2=1,v;
		char c;
		cin>>n;
		cout<<"A";
		for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++)
		{
			v=f1+f2;
			f1=f2;
			f2=v;
		//	cout<<v<<" "<<v%26<<" ";
			c=(v%26-1+'A');
			if(c=='@')
			c='Z';
			cout<<c;
		}
		cout<<endl;
	}
}
